verses.verse: O give thanks<WH3034> to the LORD;<WH3050> call<WH7121> on his name:<WH8034> make known<WH3045> his deeds<WH5949> among the people.<WH5971>
Sing<WH7891> to him, sing<WH2167> psalms<WH2167> to him: talk<WH7878> you of all<WH3605> his wondrous<WH6381> works.
Glory<WH1984> you in his holy<WH6944> name:<WH8034> let the heart<WH3820> of them rejoice<WH8055> that seek<WH1245> the LORD.<WH3050>
Seek<WH1875> the LORD,<WH3050> and his strength:<WH5797> seek<WH1245> his face<WH6440> ever more.<WH8548>
Remember<WH2142> his marvelous<WH6381> works that he has done;<WH6213> his wonders,<WH4159> and the judgments<WH4941> of his mouth;<WH6310>
O you seed<WH2233> of Abraham<WH85> his servant,<WH5650> you children<WH1121> of Jacob<WH3290> his chosen.<WH972>
He is the LORD<WH3050> our God:<WH430> his judgments<WH4941> are in all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
He has remembered<WH2142> his covenant<WH1285> for ever,<WH5769> the word<WH1697> which he commanded<WH6680> to a thousand<WH505> generations.<WH1755>
Which<WH834> covenant<WH1285> he made<WH3772> with Abraham,<WH85> and his oath<WH7621> to Isaac;<WH3446>
And confirmed<WH5975> the same to Jacob<WH3290> for a law,<WH2706> and to Israel<WH3478> for an everlasting<WH5769> covenant:<WH1285>
Saying,<WH559> To you will I give<WH5414> the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> the lot<WH2256> of your inheritance:<WH5159>
When they were but a few<WH4962> men<WH4962> in number;<WH4557> yes, very few,<WH4592> and strangers<WH1481> in it.
When they went<WH1980> from one nation<WH1471> to another, from one kingdom<WH4467> to another<WH312> people;<WH5971>
He suffered<WH3240> no<WH3808> man<WH120> to do them wrong:<WH6231> yes, he reproved<WH3198> kings<WH4428> for their sakes;<WH5921>
Saying, Touch<WH5060> not my anointed,<WH4899> and do my prophets<WH5030> no<WH408> harm.<WH7489>
Moreover he called<WH7121> for a famine<WH7458> on the land:<WH776> he broke<WH7665> the whole<WH3605> staff<WH4294> of bread.<WH3899>
He sent<WH7971> a man<WH376> before<WH6440> them, even Joseph,<WH3130> who was sold<WH4376> for a servant:<WH5650>
Whose feet<WH7272> they hurt<WH6031> with fetters:<WH3525> he was laid<WH935> in iron:<WH1270>
Until<WH5704> the time<WH6256> that his word<WH1697> came:<WH935> the word<WH565> of the LORD<WH3050> tried<WH6884> him.
The king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> and loosed<WH5425> him; even the ruler<WH4910> of the people,<WH5971> and let him go free.<WH6605>
He made<WH7760> him lord<WH113> of his house,<WH1004> and ruler<WH4910> of all<WH3605> his substance:<WH7075>
To bind<WH631> his princes<WH8269> at his pleasure;<WH5315> and teach his senators<WH2205> wisdom.<WH2449>
Israel<WH3478> also came<WH935> into Egypt;<WH4714> and Jacob<WH3290> sojourned<WH1481> in the land<WH776> of Ham.<WH2526>
And he increased<WH6509> his people<WH5971> greatly;<WH3966> and made them stronger<WH6105> than their enemies.<WH6862>
He turned<WH2015> their heart<WH3820> to hate<WH8130> his people,<WH5971> to deal subtly<WH5230> with his servants.<WH5650>
He sent<WH7971> Moses<WH4872> his servant;<WH5650> and Aaron<WH175> whom<WH834> he had chosen.<WH977>
They showed<WH7760> his signs<WH1697> <WH226> among them, and wonders<WH4159> in the land<WH776> of Ham.<WH2526>
He sent<WH7971> darkness,<WH2822> and made it dark;<WH2821> and they rebelled<WH4784> not against his word.<WH1697>
He turned<WH2015> their waters<WH4325> into blood,<WH1818> and slew<WH4191> their fish.<WH1710>
Their land<WH776> brought<WH8317> forth<WH8317> frogs<WH6854> in abundance,<WH8317> in the chambers<WH2315> of their kings.<WH4428>
He spoke,<WH559> and there came<WH935> divers sorts of flies,<WH6157> and lice<WH3654> in all<WH3605> their coasts.<WH1366>
He gave<WH5414> them hail<WH1259> for rain,<WH1653> and flaming<WH3852> fire<WH784> in their land.<WH776>
He smote<WH5221> their vines<WH1612> also and their fig<WH8384> trees; and broke<WH7665> the trees<WH6086> of their coasts.<WH1366>
He spoke,<WH559> and the locusts<WH697> came,<WH935> and caterpillars,<WH3218> and that without<WH369> number,<WH4557>
And did eat<WH398> up all<WH3605> the herbs<WH6212> in their land,<WH776> and devoured<WH398> the fruit<WH6529> of their ground.<WH127>
He smote<WH5221> also all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> in their land,<WH776> the chief<WH7225> of all<WH3605> their strength.<WH202>
He brought<WH3318> them forth<WH3318> also with silver<WH3701> and gold:<WH2091> and there was not one feeble<WH3782> person among their tribes.<WH7626>
Egypt<WH4714> was glad<WH8056> when they departed:<WH3318> for the fear<WH6343> of them fell<WH5307> on them.
He spread<WH6566> a cloud<WH6051> for a covering;<WH4539> and fire<WH784> to give light<WH216> in the night.<WH3915>
The people asked,<WH7592> and he brought<WH935> quails,<WH7958> and satisfied<WH7649> them with the bread<WH3899> of heaven.<WH8064>
He opened<WH6605> the rock,<WH6697> and the waters<WH4325> gushed<WH2100> out; they ran<WH1980> in the dry<WH6723> places like a river.<WH5104>
For he remembered<WH2142> his holy<WH6944> promise,<WH1697> and Abraham<WH85> his servant.<WH5650>
And he brought<WH3318> forth<WH3318> his people<WH5971> with joy,<WH8342> and his chosen<WH972> with gladness:<WH7440>
And gave<WH5414> them the lands<WH776> of the heathen:<WH1471> and they inherited<WH3423> the labor<WH5999> of the people;<WH3816>
That they might observe<WH8104> his statutes,<WH2706> and keep<WH5341> his laws.<WH8451> Praise<WH1984> you the LORD.<WH3050>
